query: SELECT id, fromNumber, LEFT(messageBody, 50) as message_preview, DATE_FORMAT(receivedAt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as received_time, `read` FROM customerMessages WHERE fromNumber = '+447950586880' ORDER BY receivedAt DESC
